label: Untitled
description: An abstract artwork expressing anger and fury, with hints of blue and green for balance. The process involved throwing and stabbing techniques, adding raw energy to the piece.

label: Harry Kane - Portrait
description: Harry Kane's portrait exudes a calm, composed aura, capturing his focus and quiet strength both on and off the field.

label: Harry Kane - Pen
description: I drew my favorite player, Harry Kane, in an England kit. It was quite challenging, as getting the proportions right was difficult.

label: Harry Kane - King
description: My favorite player, Kane, imagined as a king, symbolizing my wish for him to earn the trophies he truly deserves.

label: Mimi in Circles - The Wash
description: A painting of Mimi licking his legs, captured in a fisheye perspective, with cool blue and purple tones that accentuate his playful yet serene demeanor, creating a surreal and dynamic effect.

label: Mimi in Circles - The Fury
description: Painting of Mimi, looking furious with his head held high, captured in a fisheye perspective. The artwork features cool blue and purple tones, emphasizing his intense expression and giving the scene a surreal, dramatic feel.

label: Mimi in Circles - The Stare
description: A painting of Mimi, a judgmental stare fixed ahead, captured in a fisheye perspective. The cool blue and purple tones amplify his sharp expression, giving the piece a surreal and intense atmosphere.

label: TinTin - Portrait
description: A portrait of Tintin, the cat, set against an orange backdrop, capturing his lively and spirited personality, full of enthusiasm and curiosity, while also radiating a sense of calm and warmth.

label: Animals That Lives on Songshan
description: During my hike on Songshan in Henan, I spotted homeless cats and dogs. Rather than seeming sad, they appeared free and content, living with a sense of independence and joy.

label: Mimi - Portrait
description: A portrait of Mimi, the cat, with his background in playful green, capturing his energetic personality, full of curiosity and joy.

label: Corona - Portrait
description: A portrait of Corona, the cat, where her colors reflect her unique personality—vibrant and full of life, yet with a touch of mystery that mirrors her playful yet independent nature.

label: Three Cats
description: I drew my three cats—Tintin, Corona, and Mimi—in a cartoon style.

label: Corona - Abstract
description: In this painting, Corona the cat is replace onto Steven Simth's untitled painting. The cat is shown from a strange, unusual angle. Her body curves and stretches in bright, bold colors. This unique perspective makes the painting feel fresh and interesting.

label: Vow to the Princess
description: In the final scene of Tears of the Kingdom, the Sages swear their allegiance to Princess Zelda, vowing to support her and protect Hyrule.

label: Map of Hyrule (Tears of the Kingdom)
description: This painting of the Kingdom of Hyrule, inspired by The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom. Hyrule Castle, looming in the distance, is shrouded in a mystical glow, reflecting the chaos and beauty of the kingdom’s current state.

label: Not Alone
description: One Link stands at the front, ready to overcome a challenge, while the heroes of the past stand behind him, offering their support.

label: Into the Sun
description: An in-game screenshot from The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom, showing Link gliding through the twilight sky, heading toward the glowing sun. The scene captures the serene beauty of the moment, with soft hues of orange and purple blending in the horizon.

label: Landscape
description: A landscape. (Unoriginal, potentially AI created)

label: My Family
description: A cartoon-style portrait of my family, including my cats, capturing our playful personalities in a fun and vibrant way.

label: Islet
description: An isolated islet, far from the city, is somehow developing a new civilization of its own.

label: Fox and the Dinosaur
description: My first acrylic painting is a small scene featuring a dinosaur and a fox, possibly communicating with each other—it's up to the audience to guess what they're saying.
